items.content_html: Taskify is a dynamic to-do list application crafted with React, providing users with intuitive task management experience. The app integrates with json-server to offer a lightweight backend for managing task data.

items.content_html: SnapSelect is a JavaScript plugin that is designed to improve the functionality of HTML <select> elements. It is lightweight, customizable, and simple to use. SnapSelect offers a modern and sleek interface with advanced features, while remaining highly configurable and efficient.
items.title: eveltic/snapselect: SnapSelect is a JavaScript plugin that is designed to improve the functionality of HTML <select> elements. It is lightweight, customizable, and simple to use. SnapSelect offers a modern and sleek interface with advanced features, while remaining highly configurable and efficient.

items.content_html: The Shared Notes Notepad Plugin is a lightweight, non-intrusive addition to Sanity Studio that provides a convenient shared notepad functionality for team collaboration. Features: Seamless Integration: Adds a collapsible notepad interface to your Sanity Studio without interfering with existing content models or the studio's structure.
items.title: webcitydotdev/sanity-shared-notes: The Shared Notes Notepad Plugin is a lightweight, non-intrusive addition to Sanity Studio that provides a convenient shared notepad functionality for team collaboration. Features:  Seamless Integration: Adds a collapsible notepad interface to your Sanity Studio without interfering with existing content models or the studio's structure.

items.content_html: A lightweight, visually engaging Kanban board application built using Framer Motion, Next.js 14, Shadcn, and Tailwind CSS. This project was developed for learning purposes, focusing on creating a sleek and responsive task management tool.
